content:
Hi there👋. I am David Cettolo, a software engineer based in Trieste, Italy. Currently working @ Gruppo Euris S.p.a.
More about me

A Brief Bio Welcome 😁. My name is David Cettolo. I grew up in Trieste, Italy.
I am a software engineer primarly specialising in .NET development and cloud-based solutions. On daily basis, I work with a variety of tecnologies to develop and deploy lean, efficient, reliable and maintainable software solutions. That includes leveraging the .NET framework for application development, utilizing AWS cloud services for cloud-based infrastracture and implementing CI/CD pipelines with tools like Jenkins, Terraform and Docker to automate the software delivery process.
Beyond my professional life, I am passionate about sports 🏐, outdoor 🌊 and cooking 🍝.
title: About
